name: Candy Kingdom
startIntroPart2: This is an overpowered joke nation just as an example for the mods feature. Set Phasers to Obliterate!!
declaringWar: Now is the time for war. I warn you that while my people may look sweet, they are as wlling to fight for their nation as any other.
attacked: Do not think because we are made of candy we are weak.
introduction: Welcome to the Candy Kingdom, I hope we can work together for science!!!
neutralNo: I'm sorry, but the answer has to be no.
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
afterPeace: Very well, all that fighting was getting boring anyway.
tradeRequest: We bestow you the honor of this trade offer.
